titles.title: To direct the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to establish a national cemetery for veterans in Lake County or Porter County, Indiana.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Housing and Memorial Affairs.

bill.summary: 2/4/1993--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to establish a national cemetery in Lake County or Porter County, Indiana. Authorizes appropriations.
